attributes.action: Publish a full audit of government spending in the UK and abroad.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the UK tax payers deserve to know what our money is been used for. I believe a full audit will help the government to cut the waste of our tax money especially now that people are struggling to keep up with all of the increasing payments. I think the government should be fully transparent with the electorate regarding how our tax money is spent.
attributes.background: I would like a full published audit of all our government spending in the UK and abroad. Everything that is paid for with our tax should be included, and all types of tax paid by the UK tax payers should be included.

rejection.details:
The audit described in your petition is performed by the National Audit Office.

You can learn more about the NAO here: https://www.nao.org.uk/about-us/
